mapper.sql: rowid, GOODS_CODE, GOODS_NAME, SPEC_CODE, SPEC_NAME, STOCK, STORE_CODE, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG
mapper.select: SELECT b.GOODS_NAME goodsName, b.SPEC_NAME specName, b.STOCK stock FROM goods b WHERE b.SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = '1' AND b.SPEC_CODE =#{specCode} AND b.STORE_CODE =#{storeCode}

SELECT count(1) FROM goods b LEFT JOIN storehouse c ON b.STORE_CODE = c.STORE_CODE WHERE b.SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = '1'
and b.GOODS_NAME like concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into goods (rowid, GOODS_CODE, GOODS_NAME, SPEC_CODE, SPEC_NAME, STOCK, STORE_CODE, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG) values (#{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into goods
rowid,
GOODS_CODE,
GOODS_NAME,
SPEC_CODE,
SPEC_NAME,
STOCK,
STORE_CODE,
SYS_CREATE_TIME,
SYS_UPDATE_TIME,
SYS_DELETE_TIME,
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG,
#{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{specCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{specName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update goods
GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPEC_CODE = #{specCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPEC_NAME = #{specName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOCK = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STORE_CODE = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update goods set GOODS_CODE = #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPEC_CODE = #{specCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPEC_NAME = #{specName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOCK = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STORE_CODE = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
